content: Multitool wood sanding attachment Sanding attachment for the oscillating multitool, for sanding wood or paint ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out sanding attachments to cover a range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications Sanding wood or paint during renovation work Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2381638 - Sanding sheet SMT - Package Size 10 pc - 2368511 - Backing pad SMT - Package Size 1 pc
